## Download and start
```{r ,eval=F}
#Download from github
library(devtools)
install_github("chang70480/YCfun")
#wait fot installing

library(YCfun)

#check other packages have been installed.
YCstart()
```

```{r,warning=FALSE,message=F}
DT <- makeDT_lab(dir = system.file("extdata/tscs151.sav",package = "YCfun"))

```
